Package Model

Class OrderItemView

java.lang.Object
Model.OrderItemView
public class OrderItemView extends Object
A view model class that represents an item in an order, including the product's name for display purposes.

This class is typically used for displaying order item information in a user interface or report, where the product name is more informative than a product ID.
